name: Will's Bullet
description:
Submission to the ScoreSpace Jam #18: Magnetic!

Help a bullet along its path by using will to avoid walls to take out as many enemies as possible! Game features an in-game scoreboard to compete for the highest score!

How to play:

  • Use mouse movement to push the bullets direction
  • Watch out for red walls
  • Hit green enemies to score
  • Use push/ pull circles and movement spots to your advantage

Credits:

Game & Art made by Blake Simpson

Audio made in JFXR

Software Used:

Photoshop, Illustrator and Unity
